posts.post_content: It also triggers effects for "Whenever a player casts a spirit or arcane spell." It intentionally costs more than [Shower of Sparks](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shower of Sparks). If that's a problem for you, then you aren't using this card right. If you don't want to play this, consider [Searing Blaze](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Searing Blaze).
